complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Project Infrastructure and Database Schema
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the infrastructure setup into Docker configuration, FastAPI initialization, database modeling, migration setup, and initial schema creation phases
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple interconnected technologies (Docker, PostgreSQL, FastAPI, Alembic) requiring proper configuration and integration. Already well-structured with 5 subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into JWT implementation, password hashing setup, user registration endpoint, login/logout endpoints, and protected route middleware
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving security considerations, JWT handling, and FastAPI security integration. Standard authentication patterns but requires careful implementation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop LLM Integration for Receipt Processing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into LLM client abstraction, Gemini API integration, OpenAI fallback implementation, prompt engineering for receipt parsing, and response validation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to external API integration, prompt engineering requirements, fallback mechanisms, and parsing accuracy validation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Receipt Upload and Image Processing Pipeline
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into file upload endpoint creation, image preprocessing implementation, storage system setup, and upload validation/error handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving file handling, image processing, storage management, and validation logic. Multiple file formats add complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into pipeline orchestration, LLM processing integration, data validation logic, database storage workflow, and error handling/status tracking
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity as it integrates multiple previous components into a cohesive workflow with error handling and status tracking requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Basic Frontend Receipt Upload Interface
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into responsive UI framework setup, camera/file upload components, drag-and-drop functionality, and processing status interface
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving modern frontend patterns, mobile responsiveness, and real-time status updates. Well-defined UI requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Basic Analytics and Dashboard Backend
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into analytics API endpoints, database query optimization, caching implementation, and pagination/filtering logic
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity requiring efficient database queries, caching strategies, and API design for analytics data aggregation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into chart library integration, dashboard layout components, data visualization implementation, filtering/search interface, and responsive design
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to data visualization requirements, interactive chart implementation, and ensuring responsive design across devices.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into Excel library integration, export API endpoint creation, and download interface implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Lower complexity as it's a focused feature with clear requirements. Excel export is well-supported by libraries.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Receipt Verification and Manual Override System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into validation logic implementation, manual editing interface, approval workflow system, bulk editing capabilities, and data integrity checks
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving validation algorithms, complex UI for manual editing, workflow management, and ensuring data integrity across manual operations.
